root.name: Ripley's Believe It or Not!
root.description: OverviewRipley's Believe It or Not! is a pinball machine based on the Ripley's Believe It or Not! property. Ripley's Believe It or Not! was designed by Pat Lawlor for Stern Pinball in 2003.Ripley's Believe It or Not! is included in digital form on the game Pinball Arcade.
